tool_description: Evaluates and values collateral assets to determine their suitability and value for securing credit facilities.

customer_id.description: Unique identifier for the customer offering collateral

asset_description.description: Detailed description of the collateral asset

estimated_market_value.description: Estimated current market value of the asset

asset_age_years.description: Age of the asset in years

error_messages: Invalid customer_id: Customer identifier cannot be empty.
Invalid collateral_type: Must be one of [Real_Estate, Equipment, Inventory, Vehicles, Securities, Accounts_Receivable, Other].
Invalid asset_description: Asset description cannot be empty.
Invalid estimated_market_value: Market value must be a positive number.
Invalid asset_age_years: Asset age must be a non-negative number when provided.
Invalid asset_condition: Must be one of [Excellent, Good, Fair, Poor, Unknown] when provided.
usage: Provide customer_id, collateral_type, asset_description, and estimated_market_value. Optionally include asset_age_years and asset_condition for more accurate valuation. The tool returns collateral evaluation and adjusted value.

customer_id.description: Customer identifier for the collateral evaluation

loan_to_value_ratio.description: Recommended maximum loan-to-value ratio for this collateral

collateral_grade.description: Collateral quality grade: A, B, C, or D

liquidation_timeframe.description: Estimated time to liquidate collateral: Quick, Medium, or Slow

evaluation_date.description: Date when collateral was evaluated in date-time format
